alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 12:16AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Taylor County through 1245 AM EST... At 1216 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Steinhatchee, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tennille, Fish Creek, Howell Place, Clara, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Salem, Blue Springs, Carbur and Cedar Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST for Big Bend of Florida.
